metadata.feature_description: Configure whether content requires approval before publication for Answers, Discussions, Ideas, and Social Events modules.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Enable content moderation for Answers module

steps.action: Navigate to Admin > Settings > Community Settings
steps.expected: Community Settings page loads with Content Moderation section visible
steps.actual: Community Settings page loaded successfully with Content Moderation section showing all 4 module checkboxes

steps.action: Verify Answers checkbox is checked (default state) and click to uncheck, then re-check
steps.expected: Answers checkbox toggles on/off and saves successfully
steps.actual: Answers checkbox was initially checked, unchecked successfully, saved, then re-enabled and saved again

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Disable content moderation for Answers module

steps.action: Uncheck the Answers checkbox under Content Moderation

steps.actual: Save successful - 'Item successfully saved' message displayed

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Enable content moderation for Discussions module

steps.action: Verify Discussions checkbox state and toggle it
steps.actual: Discussions checkbox toggled off and back on successfully

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Disable content moderation for Discussions module

steps.actual: Discussions checkbox unchecked and saved successfully with confirmation message

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Enable content moderation for Ideas module

steps.actual: Ideas checkbox enabled and saved successfully

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Disable content moderation for Ideas module

steps.actual: Ideas checkbox unchecked and saved with success message

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Enable content moderation for Social Events module

steps.actual: Social Events checkbox enabled and saved successfully

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Disable content moderation for Social Events module

steps.action: Uncheck Social Events checkbox and save
steps.actual: Social Events checkbox unchecked and saved with success message

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Save all moderation settings and verify persistence

steps.actual: Setting saved with 'Item successfully saved' message
Answers checkbox was still unchecked after navigating away and returning - persistence verified

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify default values (all true) for new installations

steps.action: View initial state of Content Moderation checkboxes
steps.expected: All 4 checkboxes (Answers, Discussions, Ideas, Social Events) should be checked by default
steps.actual: All 4 Content Moderation checkboxes were initially checked when first viewing the Community Settings page, confirming default values are true

observations: The Content Moderation settings UI is well-organized under 'Miscellaneous Community Settings' section
All checkbox toggles function correctly with immediate visual feedback
Save operation consistently shows 'Item successfully saved' success notification
Settings persist correctly after navigating away and returning to the page
Default values for all Content Moderation options are true (enabled) as expected per documentation
